com.mapdigit.gis
Class MapLayerContainer

java.lang.Object
  com.mapdigit.gis.MapLayer
      com.mapdigit.gis.MapLayerContainer
Direct Known Subclasses:
DigitalMap
public abstract class MapLayerContainer
extends MapLayer

MapLayerContainer is a collection of map layers.

panDirection

public void panDirection(int dx,

Starts a pan with given distance in pixels. directions. +1 is right and down, -1 is left and up, respectively.
